snippet: While protests over pay might make corporate governance activists happier to think they are a sign of change, they are more likely to dissipate once the media attention surrounding them dies down.
abstract: While protests over pay might make corporate governance activists happier to think they are a sign of change, they are more likely to dissipate once the media attention surrounding them dies down.

headline.main: Furor Over Executive Pay Is Not the Revolt It Appears to Be
headline.print_headline: Furor Over Executive Pay Is Not the Revolt It Appears to Be
